sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.

name: Silken Advisor's Favor
description: To my most trusted advisors for their loyalty, wisdom, and above all - unity.

effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,191 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Sinister Gladiator's Leather Bindings

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,486 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 251,184 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,954 Agility and absorbing 1.2 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,538 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 986,532 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 283,583 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 78,773 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
